message: Hi Bob, I'm offering you a great product for $14,000. I believe it will be very valuable to you.
I appreciate your offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $12,500. Would you be willing to meet me halfway?
Bob, I understand your position, but $12,500 is too low for me. How about we settle at $13,500?
I understand your position, but $13,500 is still a bit high for me. Would you be willing to go down to $13,000?
